short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn on call privacy when on payment page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ctalk Contact Centre Extension that is used by our software to control what options are available to users.  The extension looks where the user is on a page and will change the state of an agent while they are on a call using a local listener.
